CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1946, pg. 15 reads: "Swing Your Partner - The barn dance at Hill City, youth municipality, last week was the real McCoy, with many friends of the institution on hand to enjoy the fun. This is just one of the events sponsored by Hill City to curb juvenile delinquency and to improve race relations. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Three men, including one wearing dark pinstriped three piece suit, three women, boy, and girl, dancing in couples with band playing on stage in Hill City for barn dance
